record.dc:description: Photo showing John Robert Jordison and Belle Christensen Jordison wedding; left to right: John Jordison Sr., Karen Marie Degon Jordison (Carrie), John Robert Jordison, Belle Christensen Jordison, Madge Carole Christensen, Carol Ann Pratt. Carol was adopted by Madge Christensen, her mother is Joyce Pratt; Delta, Utah; Left to right: John Jordison Sr., Karen Marie Degon Jordison (Carrie), John Robert Jordison, Belle Christensen Jordison, Madge Carole Christensen, Carol Ann Pratt. Carol was adopted by Madge Christensen, her mother is Joyce Pratt.
